sentences.sentence: Several data formats fit the raster model well.
sentences.translation: 有些数据格式可以很好地适用于栅格模型。

sentences.sentence: SVG has many advantages over raster images.
sentences.translation: 相对于光栅图片来说，SVG具有很多优势。

sentences.sentence: It goes beyond 2-d raster formats to include voxel, or 3-d, raster format.
sentences.translation: 它突破了二维栅格格式，可包括体元(voxel)或三维栅格格式。
